name: John R. MITCHELL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Mitchell v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: John R. MITCHELL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of June, 2013, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

69 A.3d 218
John R. MITCHELL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
